channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Deployment Dashboard Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Deployment Dashboard Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34795|2024-08-03T09:22:10.589Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployment%20dashboard%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Deployment Dashboard Plugin 1.0.10 and earlier does not escape environment names on its Deployment Dashboard view, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with View/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-34796|2024-08-03T09:22:10.447Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployment%20dashboard%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Deployment Dashboard Plugin 1.0.10 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-34799|2024-08-03T09:22:10.422Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployment%20dashboard%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Deployment Dashboard Plugin 1.0.10 and earlier stores a password unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-34798|2024-08-03T09:22:09.830Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployment%20dashboard%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Deployment Dashboard Plugin 1.0.10 and earlier does not perform a permission check in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-34797|2024-08-03T09:22:10.429Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployment%20dashboard%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Deployment Dashboard Plugin 1.0.10 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP URL using attacker-specified credentials.
